评论详情: I wanted to love this dress, and I had really hoped it would work out because I wanted to wear it for a function the very next day but the fabric was really low quality, it didn't look as the photos did, and it made me look extremely frumpy. I felt like I put on a potato sack and I just couldn't make it work.

Not sure yet if I am keeping this for my baby shower but wanted to leave a review for anyone wanting to see this dress on a pregnant belly as a maternity dress.  The material is very cheap and thin, like other reviews state. There is no slip; however, I don’t feel that it is see through at all. The color is just like the picture and I think with a good iron, this dress would wear nicely.  For reference, I am 5’9”, about 211 lbs, and 30 weeks pregnant. The tiers of the dress are not restricting, so I feel this dress would fit for several more weeks, if not the remainder of my pregnancy.
This dress is a sort of linen material and so comfy. Stretchy and lightweight makes it great for summer or all day wear. The colors are so cute in person. I'm 5'9 and it was a great length on me.
Its a cute dress. No iron needed , I can still breastfeed while wearing this dress!
It fits true to size and I got so many compliments. I am 5’8 and got a large. It also has stretch in the chest area.
The fabric was really thick and not breathable. The fit was not flatteringly .
I wore this to a work event with a white blazer or to the office. Super comfortable and received lots of compliments when I wore it. Great buy.

For 50 dollars i assumed i would be getting something more quality. This is a very cheap see through dress. The boob area looked funny on Postpartum boobs. I'm debating returning it and shopping local.
Love the dress. It’s not scratchy. Very comfortable. The length is great, I’m 5’4 and wanted a midi length.
I really like this dress! I got the green option and the color is very nice. The fit is very very flattering, I plan on buying other colors!

I got this for my anniversary photoshoot & loved it! The back with the tie is super cute and it is a comfy dress! I love the smocking detail, and the sleeves!! I am a true small and got the small! Lots of stretch in the bust area! Great dress!!
Loved the fit and length of this dress. I felt super confident in it and the quality was great.
I love the dress

I wore this dress for my fall family photos and the photos turned out great. The dress does hold onto a few wrinkles, despite all my efforts at ironing and steaming.  It’s fairly thin, but still looks pretty. It has a cute little tie in the back. I completely forgot that it has the tie in the back, so I tried to pull the dress down for nursing purposes and the ties completely ripped off. User error, but even without the ties in the back it still looks great. Another woman approached me during our photos and asked where I purchased the dress, which was a sweet compliment.
Not my favorite dress but it works. The material felt on the cheaper side.

评论概述: A modest dress my teenager will actually wear.
评论详情: This fabric was a little light weight, but the fit is actually really adorable.  Probably want a slip underneath but the fit was flattering for my daughter and comfortable. I was thrilled because she can be very picky, to find an item that we both like is a happy moment. This is a winner for us.  She is athletically built.  Not paper thin but not overly curvy.  We sprayed it with a water bottle and threw it in the dryer for a few minutes to knock the wrinkles out of it. It hung pretty nice right out of the package.
Loved the look of this dress but the material was super scratchy and slightly see-through.
The cutest dress for my baby shower! Nice stretchy material. Great length. Light weight for summer time!
I love this dress! It’s so flattering on and pairs great with a pair of tall white cowgirl boots. Everyone loves this outfit when I wear it!

This was great for a little Bo peep costume and my family were sheep. It was a hit in the neighborhood. It was cold and the costume still worked with a white long sleeve shirt.  I got the size large, because I knew I would later this with undergarments.
I was a little hesitant about spending $50+ on a dress but I loved it! I got an xs and it fit great. It feels very nice and lightweight. It’s great for during and after pregnancy!
I like it but it is a little thin.
Great quality and flattering
I love this dress! The fit and color are perfect for late summer, early fall activities. The fabric is thick enough to provide quality and avoid wrinkles, without being uncomfortable or bulky.
Super adorable and comfy! Wore 4 weeks postpartum for newborn pics!

评论概述: Cute but not worth the price
评论详情: This is at max a $35 dress and it comes out to $60 after tax… it’s not nice material and very thin. It’s cute and flattering and I guess if you have an abundance of money it’s worth it but in my opinion I would not pay anything over thirty bucks.
I purchased this dress for our baby shower and it was adorable! I typically wear a medium but sized up to a large here. It has great stretch and is super comfortable!

Fits great and looks really cute. I like that there’s not a ton of ruffles around the waist (I bought a similar version of this from another seller and it was more ruffle-y). The fabric quality could be better but the pro is that it’s lightweight for summer! Looks really cute with a jean jacket.

评论概述: Beautiful, well made and wrinkle-free dress
评论详情: Got the orange with white mix on special for $19.99 and I am in love with it. The material is good quality, light, wrinkle-free and the design and made is perfect. The dress hugs the body perfectly without any restrictions and its super comfortable. The lengthis perfect for flats or high heels.  The sleeves can be moved around to different styles. I wore it to Church during the Halloween Orange Fest Event and got so many compliments.Definitely will keep an eye on different colors. This brand has been consistently good on different dress styles....  Highly recommend.
The top part doesn’t flow out so it is very tight over the stomach
This dress was completely see-through. The material is incredibly thin and cheap.

I bought this dress for my baby shower. I am currently 170 lbs, 5’2”, and 8 months pregnant. I got a medium and it is perfect! It is a little see through but nothing a slip can’t help with. I absolutely love this dress and love how it makes my pregnant belly look and I also know it will fit great after pregnancy as well. I totally recommend this dress!
The dress was just as pictured and so cute! It’s definitely bump friendly and I ordered my pre pregnancy size. The material is a little thin but not bad!
This dress is super cute and it fits really well. My only complaint is that the fabric is very thin and see through.
The material is so thin than on the sun you can see through
I used this dress for my baby shower and it was perfect! I love it because it’s a non maternity dress that fits the belly bump and can also be used once I have the baby!
Very pretty, but needs a slip. Would also recommend sizing up if you have wider hips as the hip area is snug.
I wore this dress for my gender reveal and it was the cutest. Comfortable & fit great. May have to buy another one in another color soon. Loved it! 🩷🩷

The puff sleeves and ruffles look nice, but they don't hold their shape well and make the dress feel flimsy. After just one wash, it started to lose its shape and the colors faded a bit.  Overall, I had high hopes for this dress, but the quality issues really detracted from the overall experience. I wouldn’t recommend it if you’re looking for something that will last.
This dress is so cute! I get so many compliments every time I wear it. It truly resembles the photo shown with the color, style, and fit!
The dress is cute but unfortunately I was charged for two dresses and only ever received one. I never needed two.

I wore this to an outdoor wedding and it fit the theme perfectly. I got a lot of compliments, too. It was light enough but not see through. Very comfortable and fit perfectly. I’m about 145lbs and 5’6.
I bought this dress for 50.00 and it was so not worth it. Cheap quality, itchy to the skin.
The quality is so good! Wearing a size small! I’ve gotten so many compliments on this dress already! Perfect all year but love the colors for fall!
Good quality, looks good, comfortable, material not see trough, not getting wrinkled easily.
Love this dress. It fits true size. I’m a medium. Not tight. It’s comfortable. I get lots of compliments when I wear it. I would buy another color.
The material is nice, on the thicker side. Length is just above ankles for someone who is 5'3. It was one of my favorite dresses I've purchased on Amazon.
Ordered in gray and orange. I was going to keep the gray one but decided to return both. They are nice, but they were giving to much Little House on the Prairie to me.
Got small size and fits me right
My granddaughter just loved this dress!
I wore this to my baby sprinkle 34 weeks pregnant and it looked so great! I wore a Large and it fits TTS. Lightweight and flattering!
This dress is comfortable, stretchy and good quality! The top is easy to pull down which is great for breastfeeding. I loved the dress so much, I bought another color.
Just what I needed for family photos. I’m 5’3 135 lb and a Small fit perfect.

It's lightweight and comfortable and very attractive. The skirt is a little sheer but I haven't had issues with it. Overall it fits well and is very cute, so I am keeping it, but I absolutely hate that it doesn't have pockets...you could have had the perfect dress if you just gave it pockets. Other than that I would recommend it.  For the bra girlies, you can wear a bra with it, you just have to wear one of those wider set ones, it has a tie in the back to hold up the sleeves if they're worn up which is a nice touch.
The mater, the color
I’m a high school teacher and our colors are orange and white. This dress is super flattering and works even on my 6’1” frame.
Very cute and comfy! I wore this all day on a bachelorette trip to Seattle and it was great! Light and breathable, but not thin or cheap feeling.
I love this dress! I always receive so many compliments when I wear it. I’ve been wearing it a lot since having a baby and it hides the PP pouch and just so comfortable. True to size
I get lots of compliments when I wear this dress.  The only thing I don’t like is the elastic around the arms on the sleeve.  It is too snug.
Love this comfortable dress! Was perfect for maternity photos!
I got so many compliments! Perfect dress for teaching. It would also be super cute for a Little Bo Peep Halloween costume (I got the pink).

评论概述: Adorable on others, but not for my body type
评论详情: I'm a plus-sized pear with a short torso (5'5", L in tops, 14 or 16 in bottoms), and almost everything about this dress did not work for me. I ordered the XL in the yellow plaid. The square neck was too wide, the smocked top came down too low on my torso, the elastic on the sleeves was tight, and the skirt's decorative seam hit mid-hip (my widest point). I don't have sensory issues and even I found the material to be scratchy and uncomfortable. You could see through it too much to be wearable in my opinion. I think this is an adorable dress for longer, less curvy body types who are comfortable wearing slips and tolerating scratchy fabric.
I like the look and fit of this dress! I just wish it had a slip or was less see through. I recommend tan spanx underneath!
Loving this dress to throw on all the time. Very bump friendly too

I love this dress and get so many compliments every time I wear it! It is lightweight, flattering and super comfortable and the puff sleeves & gingham pattern are adorable. It doesn’t look too tablecloth-y which I was worried about and it isn’t lined, but it isn’t see through. I took off one star because the material is on the thinner side and I think the tie in the back could have been left off. I don’t think it’s worth the full price but I got it for $17 on promo!  It runs true to size. I am 5’5 and a size 8/10 and the medium fit perfectly and is a great midi length.  Overall, I would definitely recommend this dress, especially on deal!
Bought this dress for new baby family photos. Have since worn it for bridal showers, baby showers, and other events. Quality material and always get compliments on it.
Absolutely love this dress! It fit great and was actually very comfy! 10/10 would buy in every color possible!

I liked the look of the dress overall, but am I the only one who thought the elastic on the sleeves was tight? Love the poof of the sleeve above it but I thought it was pretty tight. Overall not a bad dress but the fabric was a little stiff in my opinion.

It’s so cute! Go ahead & order it for family pics or date night—I’ll be wearing for some informal family pics. Too is smocked so can easily be pulled down to breastfeed—that’s a big reason I got this for the season of life I’m in. Order regular size.
Fits is great I do not like the fabric it’s weird not breathable but I keep it because is for a Halloween costume and now that I think about it , it actually feels like a costume.
Worked well with my Dorothy outfit for community service project. Was a little big but comfortable
My daughter loved this dress. Very coquette.

I have a fondness for gingham , and this dress is adorable . I have been Leary about purchasing clothing from Amazon , as I do love slow sustainable brands and like to spend my money on pieces that will last a long time . However , I am 5 months pregnant and have been wanting to get some flowy feminine dresses to wear during and post pregnancy.  I’m impressed by the quality , and the vibrancy of the mint ( Green ) color . I bought a medium, and feel like it fits true to size even with my little baby bump.  I feel super cute and feminine in it , and hope to continue wearing it into early Fall with some cute cowboy boots and a denim Jacket . Tempted To get it in another color since it’s 48% off right now.  Get this dress if you want to feel girly and feminine !

Overall, a really cute dress, I bought it for a festival that I am going to. For the price I don’t believe it is worth $60. I bought it for a discounted price of $27 but I was extremely disappointed with the type of material, it just doesn’t feel like it should be worth $60. Overall, would buy it again if was cheaper
This was a very comfortable dress - bump friendly too! I wore this dress to my maternity shoot and it was perfect!
Beautiful dress. Worked great for family photos. Size up!
The dress is pretty, the fabric is extremely light weight and comphy for hot weather. The top is shirred with light elastic making it ok to wear without a bra. The downside is wrinkles easily.

I bought this dress for my daughter. She likes it because it is comfortable and is the perfect length for her height (5' 5"). She loves the poufy sleeves and how nice it fits. And every time she wears it, she gets compliments about how pretty she looks in it. I would highly recommend this dress.
Such a pretty dress. Came with a lot of wrinkles, after steaming it- it was perfect. Love this. Medium fit great.

评论概述: Beautiful for maternity pictures & baby shower!
评论详情: Absolutely love this dress! Wore it to my baby shower and maternity pictures. Will probably buy it in another color!

Cute and comfortable dress. I (millennial) even got a compliment from a Gen Z-er that it's "giving picnic," so I'd say that means it's Gen Z approved 😂. Lightweight but still well made. Elastic bodice is flexible and makes finding your fit easier. I enjoyed the tan as it shows off the beautiful gingham pattern without being too tablecloth-y. Definitely tempted to buy another in a different color as well because I enjoy wearing this dress

So this dress is SO flattering and SO cute - perfect length, the tiers and width are perfect for a bump🤰🏻and I’m so excited to wear it at my October shower!! Got the yellow color & am in love, it’s exactly what it looks like in the pictures. *Cons: By wearing it, it’s pretty evident that it’s not top quality. I got it on a little bit of a sale, but I wouldn’t be super happy if I had paid the original price (~$57?). The fabric is stiff and cheap feeling, the elastic on the arms isn’t covered/lined so it’s not super comfy. It’s not a reason for me to send it back or not want to wear it, it’s not terrible and I am excited to wear it, I don’t expect it’ll fall apart, but I just expected a little more quality for the cost.

It is a very pretty dress but the fabric is very obviously cheaply made. The fabric is very thin and cheap feeling, some stitching was loose immediately. It does however look very pretty on, you’ll just have to make sure you put a slip on or biker shorts if you don’t want it to be sheer.

The quality is poor. Felt like an itchy paper napkin. Yes, it is that thin. Threading was coming out when I opened it. It runs small and looks cheap. My friend said I looked like I was dressed up as Dorothy for a Halloween Party ( and I agree). Total crap and not worth the price.

I received the right dress and all but it arrived inside you, and when I turned the dress right side out, it was stained. At first I thought it was dried blood but I think it’s more than likely another type of stain. Regardless, will be sending back.

评论用户: Not good material and run very small
评论详情: Dislike…..bad quality and size run small
This dress is way cute! It was perfect to wear to a backyard summer wedding.

I never ever leave reviews but was surprised at this dress. This is actually a great dress for the price! It’s way more flattering once on. I’m giving 4 stars because the fabric is thin and a litttttle cheap. This could be good in my climate though. I like the fit a lot! Great elastic for breast feeding which is why I wanted this. Overall, worth it. Ordered in emerald and it’s equally as cute
material is not good and the seams in the hips and waist are so bad it puckers
It is my second dress I have blu light and I love 2 dresses very much!))
Love this dress cute dress…get so many compliments on it

Steamed this dress. Then ironed this dress. The material doesn't flatten out. If you don't mind a crinkled look, this is for you. I didn't personally like it. Other than that, it's a cute dress and the fabric isn't too thick.
This dress is cute and has a country look to it but the material is very thin!
poor quality material
I have ordered quite a few Amazon dresses of late. Most have been returned. Not this one!It’s just so cute!  Fits perfect!  I want another color.
Got this dress for a baby shower and I got so many compliments. Dress was lightweight but not sheer. Perfect for my work or church.
The dress is beautiful, the fit is nice. My only complaint would be the fabric quality. It’s sheer and kind of thin. This dress probably won’t last long, unfortunately, due to the quality.
This dress has gotten so many compliments and  is definitely cute. Be aware there’s no lining to the dress so it could be see-through in sunny weather, otherwise it’s great.

I always get nervous ordering clothes from Amazon but this dress is my new favorite! It was so comfortable and flattering! I received so many compliments while I was wearing it! I highly recommend it!
I needed a dress for Sommerfest, I received it in 2 days, it was very comfortable and a great fit!!!
